item.title: About
item.description: Dear visitor, welcome to my personal website where I write what I have learnt or thought in my daily life. I am glad to hear what brings you here. Do not hesitate to share in the comment below! ğŸ˜„ Who am I? Hi, I am Guankai Ji. I am a mobile client development engineer who is passionate about android platform. I am experienced in native android and cross platform Flutter development.
